content: materials our super soft merino bundle 1 includes all the yarn to make your own super easy crib blanket - 7 skeins of purl soho s super soft merino 2 100% merino wool each skein is 87 yards/ 100 grams approximately 609 yards required learn about all the palettes we ve knit over the years by visiting our 2012 3 2014 4 and 2017 5 blog posts for details you will also need - us 13 9 mm 24- or 32-inch circular needles 6 gauge 11 stitches = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions approximately 30 inches x 32 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/super-soft-merino-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/super-soft-merino html 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/2012/11/30/super-easy-crib-blanket-in-super-soft-merino/ 4 http //www purlbee com/2014/10/25/super-easy-crib-blanket-in-super-soft-merinos-newest-colors/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/2017/01/04/super-easy-crib-blankets-in-new-colors/ 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796
